description:
Converts an element (a group) to a PNG, which can then be accessed and saved or downloaded directly to the user's computer. Â  
Note: Fixed the common know bug - Unable to export the images inside the group.

- export any group to png. 
- dynamic file name. 
- save the image to Bubble Database. 
- store images on the client side.

name: Screenshot the Group
plugin_instructions:
- expose the add HTML ID to elements (Settings => General => Enable "Option the option to add an ID attribute to HTML elements"
- add the ID to the Group you want to export as the image. 
- drag the element "Element as PNG" to the editor. 
- use the workflow "Export Image"
